TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DeletedTextHandler(object o, DeletedTextArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed DeletedTextHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DeletedTextHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DeletedTextHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DeletedTextHandler is removed from the event.
